posts.post_title: T206 HOF Portraits MATHEWSON PSA 4.5 / YOUNG PSA 4 / EVERS PSA 6 / BROWN PSA 6
posts.post_content:
Centered beauties. Please take a look at my consignments in the upcoming Goldin auction. Scan below.  Closing in 2 days!!

[url]https://goldinauctions.com/1909_11_T206_White_Border_Christy_Mathewson__Portr-LOT32293.aspx[/url]

[url]https://goldinauctions.com/1909_11_T206_White_Border_Cy_Young__Cleveland__Por-LOT32294.aspx[/url]

[url]https://goldinauctions.com/1909_11_T206_White_Border_Johnny_Evers__Portrait__-LOT32292.aspx[/url]

[url]https://goldinauctions.com/1909_11_T206_White_Border_Mordecai_Brown__Portrait-LOT32291.aspx[/url]
No prices? How much for the Mordecai portrait?

Aaron, I think your cards are in the second group, which closes June 3. Or did I get that wrong?

In any case, I got my catalogue yesterday. Nice cards.  :)

Thanks Sean. I just noticed that! It's kind of confusing. I will update my listings. 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

I may be wrong here, and I'm not trying to police the forums, but I was under the impression that these types of auction notifications would go in this "Ebay, Auction and other Venues Announcement- B/S/T" forum:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/forumdisplay.php?f=16[/url]

[quote name="CW" post=1662442]I may be wrong here, and I'm not trying to police the forums, but I was under the impression that these types of auction notifications would go in this "Ebay, Auction and other Venues Announcement- B/S/T" forum:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/forumdisplay.php?f=16[/url][/QUOTE]

Yeah, I got really excited seeing cards of this caliber in the BST, but the excitement wanes when you realize that you have pay a 20% fee to Goldin for the privilege of buying these cards.

[quote name="CW" post=1662442]I may be wrong here, and I'm not trying to police the forums, but I was under the impression that these types of auction notifications would go in this "Ebay, Auction and other Venues Announcement- B/S/T" forum:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/forumdisplay.php?f=16[/url][/QUOTE]

Agreed.  Lots of people here consign great stuff to auction houses -- they shouldn't be clogging up the main b/s/t threads with what are in effect advertisements.

[quote name="mechanicalman" post=1662467]Yeah, I got really excited seeing cards of this caliber in the BST, but the excitement wanes when you realize that you have pay a 20% fee to Goldin for the privilege of buying these cards.[/QUOTE]

Right, he always has nice cards too but the 20% is a killer..
